de.javasoft.util.java2d
Class DropShadow

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.util.java2d.DropShadow

public class DropShadow
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a drop shadow for a buffered image in highQuality or lowQuality (faster).

Version:
1.03, 23.06.2015
